GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.89
GSD.description:
sched/core: Fix use-after-free bug in dup_user_cpus_ptr()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.89 by commit b22faa21b6230d5eccd233e1b7e0026a5002b287, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 07ec77a1d4e82526e1588979fff2f024f8e96df2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sched/core: Fix use-after-free bug in dup_user_cpus_ptr()
